title: The Hybrid's Mate
description: Having been called a ‘healer’ for their rich blood, Shay Edens scours the world in search of her one true love to help her through a horrendous heat cycle. But what she finds is a vampire, a vampire of royalty. Draven, enthralled at the very sight of her, enchanted by her scent, magnetized by her body and hypnotized by her violet eyes.
author: Jennifer Cooper
